page.title: 01 GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: This area consists almost entirely of farm land.A closer look, however, reveals many interesting features. The main road from Ripon to North Stainley the A6108 is the only road in the area. Parallel to it, to the east runs the River Ure, which provides the parish boundary.Between the river and the road are several farms and a nature reserve. East of the river and in the top right-hand corner of the grid lies {Norton Conyers,}a large old house now open to the public. On the other side of the grid, west of the road is{Lightwater Valley Farm. This is more than just a farm; it is also an amusement park which is very popular in the Summer.
